original: Bjursten, Karl Magnus Henrik, konstnär, Göteborg, f. 3/5/07 i Gbg av riksb .-kassör Karl B. o. Anna Lunde-vaiil. — Stud. v. Slöjdifören. sk. i Gbg 21-24, Valands målarsk. 25-27, Maison Watteau i Paris 27-28. Stud:res. t. Danm., Tyskl., HolL, Belg. o. Frankr. 25, Frankr. 27-28, Frankr. o. Spanien 32, Frankr. 39. Har utfört porträtt, figursaker, landskap o. stilleben i olja. Repr. m. Atelierinteriör i Gävle mus.
translated: Bjursten, Karl Magnus Henrik, artist, Gothenburg, b. 3/5/07 in Gothenburg to National Bank treasurer Karl B. and Anna Lunde-wail. - Studied at the Slöjdifören. school in Gothenburg 21-24, at Valand's painting school 25-27, and at Maison Watteau in Paris 27-28. Traveled for study to Denmark, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, and Spain in 25, 27-28, 32, and 39. Has created portraits, figurines, landscapes, and still lifes in oil. Represented with an Atelier interior painting at the Gävle Museum.

hasOccupation.name: Artist
hasOccupation.description: Created portraits, figurines, landscapes, and still lifes in oil.
